text.section:
Sec. 33-39. Penalty for violation of chapter.
Any person who shall violate a provision of this chapter, or fails to comply therewith, or with any of the requirements thereof, shall upon conviction thereof in the County Court, be punished by a fine not to exceed five hundred dollars ($500.00) or by imprisonment in the County Jail for not more than sixty (60) days, or by both such fine and imprisonment. Any person who violates or fails to comply with this chapter shall also be subject to fines in accordance with of this Code. Each day of violation or noncompliance shall constitute a separate offense.
